extendedInfo.description: - Make sure you have wifi location turned off  and gps location turned on before using the app and the mock locations enabled.-If you have a problem with the application and if it is not running it will be more helpful if you contact me by mail.If you have issues using the app contact me by email. Introducing Fake GPS - currently the best looking fake location app from all the fake location apps! Fake GPS tricks your phone into thinking that it is somewhere else. You can be in Rome, London, New York or simply anywhere in the world. Itâs simple and great fun to trick people with. You can use Fake GPS to pull a prank or show that youâre somewhere else as an excuse. Itâs a simple idea with a lot of potential. How does it work? The application essentially makes your Android phone believe that it is anywhere that want it to be. Fake GPS turns any location into your current location with just the touch of a button. It takes two steps to fake your location, first, enable âMock Locationsâ in developer settings; then, simply set your new location using the Fake GPS app. When could I use it?You can use it to prank your friends and family. You can also pretend that you are somewhere completely strange - like the middle of the Pacific Ocean! You can be anywhere you want! Fake GPS is easy to use, fast and fun. Explore wonderful possibilities and be anywhere you want using the easy-to-use interface. It takes merely seconds to set your new location. - Fake your location with just two steps!- Easy to use and can be done by anyone!- Can be used to play pranks or as an excuse!- Post fake check in !**- This fake location app requires to have google play services, and google maps installed.- It might not work with some apps, but it works with facebook,whatsapp,twitter, and other apps.Feel free to contact me by email for anything regarding this app.

reviews.comment: 8/29/13 If you actually read the details of my complaint,  I have already tried every possible  combination :/ It DOES NOT WORK, at least not for S4 & its not only me having this issue...8/25/13 Installed updated ver but issues  Mock location is enabled & mobile data is disabled as well as GPS and wifi; doesn\'t work. Tried after  enabling wifi, doesn\'t work. Tried disabling wifi & enabling mobile date, doesn\'t work. I have tried every single possible \"combo\" & it still DOES NOT WORK! :/
